title: [1.7.2][SSP]Damage Screenshots-伤害截图
author: so_fly
txt_content:
本帖最后由 so_fly 于 2014-8-26 13:32 编辑 

Damage Screenshots是一个非常实用mod，他可以在你受到伤害时自动为你截图，并保存到游戏目录里的screenshots文件夹，让你知道你为什么死。

作者的话：It's no fun trying to fiddle with your screenshot hotkeys when under fire by a skelly! Damage screenshots can take screenshots for you, as you take damage (which will show your health bar before you take the damage) and a configurable number of ticks after (to show damage afterwards.) Damage Screenshots also can take pictures before and after you deal damage to mobs. 

Forget about trying to get combat screenshots; just have fun playing and afterwards enjoy a screenshot folder full of great action shots! 
翻译：当你受到伤害再自己截图，这并不好玩！伤害截图可以帮助你截图，在你承受伤害（伤害你的血量栏）和一个可配置的刻度数后（对损伤后损伤的截图。）也可以拍到伤害来源。如果你忘记了战斗画面；只要打开截图文件夹就可以看到！




作者正在制作1.7.10的版本，制作完成之后我也会搬运过来

这都是在受到伤害时，mod自动截下的图片。
